title: The Eminence in The Dungeon
text: The minotaur is dead, both the h'ro and the apprentice art did confuse.  those gents knoweth something unnatural hath happened but can't seemeth to followeth.  the h'ro
seeth thou art looking at those folk in aw and claims vict'ry ov'r the magical beast!
the apprentice then shakes in t'rr'r, in front of that gent stands a 4 st'ries tall magical golem (looks liketh this w'rld is swarming with fantasy-like beings).
the h'ro charges in and screams while the apprentice stays in shocketh, thee decideth yond thee forsooth needeth to int'rvene.  so thee rolleth a kicketh the bucket,
thee obviously can det'rmine the result of t because of thy ultra-instincts what shalt befall?

buttons.text: You all rush forward while the alchamist tries to stun the boss, you make it look like he blinded him by poking his eyes in god level speed.

You hear the hero saying 'we should combine our power, its not the time to argue' we are a team. - lucky for him the dice landed on 7, its my favorite number so i made it look like he triped and fell on a hugh ass bolder,  and somehow all the floor above him croumbled(as the hero thinks he made it crumble).

The dice landed on 4 - you make it look like the hero landed a hit but it was you(obviously) while the golem is stunned, you go in even if you know there is nothing there. just empty space alot of empty space.
It landed on 1, so you all go back and regroup.
